PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types and no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.IFC4.3.0.0 DEPRECATION The Reference property is deprecated and shall no longer be used, use attribute Name on the relating type instead.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the x-axis of the local coordinate system of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the y-axis of the local coordinate system of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length measured along the z-axis of the local coordinate system of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: InletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the inlet connection. Note that all inlet connections are assumed to be the same size.

PropertyDef.Name: OutletConnectionSize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size of the outlet connection from the object.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the y-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the object.
